Method Detail

getTrecRecommenderEvaluator


public static TrecRecommenderEvaluator getTrecRecommenderEvaluator(TrecRecommenderEvaluatorFactory.TREC_REC_EVALUATOR_TYPE type)
This method creates the three evaluation methodologies which does not require any parameter.

Parameters:
type - type of evaluator
Returns:
an instance of an evaluator with no parameter
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the type is incorrect

getTrecRecommenderEvaluator


public static TrecRecommenderEvaluator getTrecRecommenderEvaluator(TrecRecommenderEvaluatorFactory.TREC_REC_EVALUATOR_TYPE type,

                                                                   float threshold,

                                                                   int N,

                                                                   java.lang.String itemsFile)
This method creates the other three evaluation methodologies which require a small number of parameters. By default, if the type does not match any of these methodologies, #getTrecRecommenderEvaluator(TREC_REC_EVALUATOR_TYPE) is called.

Parameters:
type - type of evaluator
threshold - relevance threshold: any rating greater or equal to this value is considered relevant
N - number of not-relevant items to include in the evaluation
itemsFile - file name where the relation of not-relevant items for each user is stored
Returns:
an instance of an evaluator

initEvaluator


public static void initEvaluator(TrecRecommenderEvaluator evaluator,

                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> training,

                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> test,

                                 java.lang.String qrelFile,

                                 java.lang.String relFile,

                                 org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.recommender.Recommender rec,

                                 java.lang.String recName,

                                 java.lang.String outFolder)
This method allows for initialize with some data a given evaluator, by calling the proper methods of the interface.

Parameters:
evaluator - evaluator to initialize
training - training set
test - test set
qrelFile - file where qrels will be stored, or null
rec - recommender
recName - name of the recommender
outFolder - folder where the recommender output will be generated

                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> training,

                                 java.lang.String[] recNames,

                                 java.lang.String outFolder)
This method allows for initialize with some data a given evaluator, by calling the proper methods of the interface.

Parameters:
evaluator - evaluator to initialize
training - training set
test - test set
qrelFile - file where qrels will be stored, or null
recs - recommenders
recNames - names of the recommenders
outFolder - folder where the recommender output will be generated

initEvaluator


public static void initEvaluator(TrecRecommenderEvaluator evaluator,

                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> training,

                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.Float>> test,

                                 int userThreads,

                                 int recThreads,

                                 org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.recommender.Recommender wrappingRecommender,

                                 int maxSize,

                                 boolean overwriteEvalFile,

                                 java.lang.String qrelFile,

                                 java.lang.String relFile,

                                 org.apache.mahout.cf.taste.recommender.Recommender[] recs,

                                 java.lang.String[] recNames,

                                 java.lang.String outFolder)
This method allows for initialize with all the possible data a given evaluator, by calling the proper methods of the interface.

Parameters:
evaluator - evaluator to initialize
training - training set
test - test set
userThreads - number of threads to use (one for each user), 0 by default
recThreads - number of threads to use (one for each recommender), 0 by default
wrappingRecommender - recommender to use when the evaluated recommender is not able to return a recommendation, defualt: a dummy recommender which always returns 0
maxSize - maximum length of the ranking list, 1000 by default
overwriteEvalFile - flag to indicate whether the evaluation file should be overwritten or not, false by default
qrelFile - file where qrels will be stored, or null
recs - recommenders
recNames - names of the recommenders
outFolder - folder where the recommender output will be generated
